thread.title: Photos: The Patriots look for payback against the Colts
thread.title_full: Photos: The Patriots look for payback against the Colts

title: Photos: The Patriots look for payback against the Colts
text: Patriots owner Robert Kraft roams the sidelines before the game. AJ Mast / AP A large contingent of Patriots fans made the trip for what might have been Tom Brady’s first game back from his appealed suspension. Barry Chin / The Boston Globe During warm ups, Brady talks to running back LeGarrette Blount, who scored scored three touchdowns against the Colts in the AFC championship last season. Barry Chin / The Boston Globe More Colts fans with signs referring to Deflategate. Brian Spurlock / USA Today Indianapolis Mayor Greg Ballard checks out a sign outside the Patriots’ tunnel. AJ Mast / AP
